Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の人
Entry.EnglishText: Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 道具屋「水の戯れ」
Entry.EnglishText: Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウン
Entry.EnglishText: Sunnytown

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウン・道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Sunnytown - Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 旅行記ならデートの参考にしようと 思って借りたわよ。 わざわざ取りに来てくれたんだ。
Entry.Notes: This is reference the book side quest that linked to a librairy i think this npc has the travelogue in their possession - pegi

Entry.JapaneseText: そういえば借りたのって ずいぶん前だったものね。 すっかり忘れてたわ……はい！
<Green>『旅行記』を回収しました。
Entry.EnglishText: You got back the Travelogue.

Entry.JapaneseText: 恋愛小説が読みたいんだけど 前に旅行記を借りたままだったから 借りに行きずらくって……
Entry.EnglishText: I'd love to read a romance novel, but I still have a travelogue I'd borrowed before, so I couldn't go borrow it

Entry.JapaneseText: 恋愛小説を 貸してくれるの？
Entry.EnglishText: Would you lend me the Romance Novel?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>『恋愛小説』を貸し出しました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>You handed over the Romance Novel.

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう。 さっそく読ませてもらうわね。
Entry.EnglishText: Thanks! I'll start reading it right away.

Entry.JapaneseText: そう……違うの。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh... That's not the right one.
Entry.Notes: Need to check to see if it's when you give her the wrong book - pegi

Entry.JapaneseText: この本ありがとうね。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you for this book

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>『恋愛小説』を回収しました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>You got back the Romance Novel.

Entry.JapaneseText: おかげで楽しい時間を 過ごせたわ♪
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you, I enjoyed it.♪

Entry.JapaneseText: ごめんなさい。 まだ読み終わってないの。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sorry. I'm still not finished reading it yet.

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近ちょっと落ち込んでたから、 いい気分転換になったわ。 ありがと♪
Entry.EnglishText: I've been in low spirits lately, so this has been a nice change of pace. Thanks.♪

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ、地鳴りなんて聞こえる？ このお店にいると、楽しくて 自分の世界に入っちゃうのよね。
Entry.EnglishText: What? Did I notice the ground shake? Sorry, when I'm in this store, I have so much fun that I just become self-absorbed.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここのお店、好きなのよね。 商品を見てるだけで 楽しくなっちゃうわ。
Entry.EnglishText: I like this shop a lot. I mostly look at the wares, but I enjoy coming here.

Entry.JapaneseText: ウチの夫、ここはヒューマの店だから 入りたくない、なんて言ってたけど、 理解に苦しむわ。
Entry.EnglishText: My husband says he doesn't like to come here because it's a Huma shop, but I just don't understand why.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの女の子が さらわれた、ですって？
Entry.EnglishText: So you're telling me that Huma girls are being kidnapped?

Entry.JapaneseText: それは大変！ ぜひ助けてあげてね！
Entry.EnglishText: That's horrible! Please save them!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんか外が大変な事に なってるみたいね？
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like there's something horrible happening outside.

Entry.JapaneseText: しばらく外には 出ないほうがよさそうね。
Entry.EnglishText: I think it's best to stay inside for the moment.

Entry.JapaneseText: うちに隠れるような ところはないけど？
Entry.EnglishText: There's no hiding places here though...

Entry.JapaneseText: 広場の方が騒がしいけど…… 何かお祭りでもやってるの？
Entry.EnglishText: The town square's quite noisy today, is there a festival or something?

Entry.JapaneseText: それともまた 誰かが暴れてる……？
Entry.EnglishText: Or is someone rampaging again?

Entry.JapaneseText: お披露目の儀式って、 記念品とか発売されるのかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if there will be any commemorative items on sale at Her Highness' inauguration ceremony?

Entry.JapaneseText: もしそうなら、このお店にも 仕入れてもらわなくちゃだわ♪
Entry.EnglishText: If so, then I might have to stock up on some of them for this shop~

Entry.JapaneseText: ……このお店、あまり ガジュマ向けの品は ないと思うけど……？
Entry.EnglishText: I don't think there's anything here for you Gajumas though...

Entry.JapaneseText: どうも！ 楽しいお店よね。
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome! This is a fun store, isn't it?

Entry.JapaneseText: 時々、水に浸かった商品が 混じってるから 気をつけなくちゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: There will be times when some waterlogged items get mixed in among the commodities so I have to be careful when sorting them out.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: 外が大変な事に なってるみたいだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like something bad's happening outside, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: 営業をやめるわけには いかないわ……
Entry.EnglishText: I can't just stop doing my job and leave...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 道具を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: 大変な事になってますけど また来てくださいね。
Entry.EnglishText: I know it's really dangerous outside but please come again!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、あのお客さん見てて 反省しました……
Entry.EnglishText: I've just been reminded of something when I looked at you...

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族の事なんて、 気にするような話じゃ ないんだって……
Entry.EnglishText: That I shouldn't worry about something like our differences as opposite races...

Entry.JapaneseText: 怖くて外に出られないわ！ 今日の納品、ちゃんと届くかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: I-I can't bring myself to go outside, I'm scared! I-I hope my products properly arrive at their destination...

Entry.JapaneseText: すいません…… 私、話題にとぼしい ヒューマなんです……
Entry.EnglishText: Sorry, I'm not really good at thinking up topics to talk about...

Entry.JapaneseText: 怖くて外に出られないわ！ 今日の納品、ちゃんと届くかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: I-I can't bring myself to go outside, I'm scared! I-I hope my products properly arrive at their destination...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマって、なんとなく ずうずうしい気がしません？
Entry.EnglishText: Don't you think that those Gajumas are a little... brazen?

Entry.JapaneseText: モサッとしてるっていうか、 お客さんだとしても、 なんだかイヤなんですよね……
Entry.EnglishText: If I were to describe it... perhaps they're... unrefined? I can't really help but dislike them even if they're a customer.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そこにいるガジュマ、全然 出ていってくれないんですよ…… 私がイヤな顔してるのに……
Entry.EnglishText: And that Gajuma over there... They're not leaving! I don't want them here!

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、ヒューマとガジュマが どうなってるのか知らないのかしら。 まったくずうずうしい……
Entry.EnglishText: How shameless, I wonder if you truly know what's going on between Gajumas and Humas at the moment...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、あのお客さん見てて 反省しました……
Entry.EnglishText: I've just been reminded of something when I looked at you...

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族の事なんて、 気にするような話じゃ ないんだって……
Entry.EnglishText: That I shouldn't worry about something like our differences as opposite races...

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウンは観光地だから お土産品しかないって言う人も いますけど……ウチは違います！
Entry.EnglishText: Some say that Sunnytown's a tourist attraction and only has souvenirs, but... I think not!

Entry.JapaneseText: 買い物してるどころ じゃないですかね……
Entry.EnglishText: You're not just here to window-shop are you...?

Entry.JapaneseText: はい……なんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, can I help you...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 道具を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: ……また来なくても いいですよ……
Entry.EnglishText: It's okay if you don't come back...

Entry.JapaneseText: ひやかしなら…… やめてください……
Entry.EnglishText: Please stop if you're just window-shopping...

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃいませ、 ヒューマのお客様！
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome, Huma customers!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 道具を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: また来てくださいね、 ヒューマのお客様！
Entry.EnglishText: Please come back, Huma customers!

Entry.JapaneseText: また来てくださいね、 ヒューマのお客様！
Entry.EnglishText: Please come back, Huma customers!

Entry.JapaneseText: ね、ねえ、この音…… 津波なんかじゃないわよね!?
Entry.EnglishText: H-Hey... This sound... This isn't from a tidal wave, right...?

Entry.JapaneseText: こ、この街は、 津波だけはダメだって……
Entry.EnglishText: This city will get done in if a tidal wave comes...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……はい、何ですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, how can I help you?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 道具を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなにウチの店で…… 買いたいですか……？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you really sure you want to buy at my store?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマのお客様、 お待ちしてました！
Entry.EnglishText: I've been waiting for you, Huma guests!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 道具を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: また来てくださいね。 ヒューマのお客様！
Entry.EnglishText: Please come back, Huma customers!

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃいませ。 何をお探しですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome! What are you looking for?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 道具を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとうございました。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you very much!

Entry.JapaneseText: また来てくださいね。
Entry.EnglishText: Come back again!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『くらしの小知識』 ・ピーチグミを食べると、 体力回復だけじゃなくて お肌もピーチピチ！ ・ホーリィボトルは ほーりぃ投げちゃイヤン。 「水の戯れ」店主より
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0> - Small Wisdoms of Life - * Eating Peach gels not only restores your health but also makes your skin as pink as a peach! * Please don't hurl your Holy Bottles in the canal. - Store Owner.
